memberdef.definition: typedef void(* lwm2m_os_pdn_event_handler_t) (uint8_t cid, enum lwm2m_os_pdn_event event, int reason)
memberdef.argsstring: )(uint8_t cid, enum lwm2m_os_pdn_event event, int reason)
memberdef.name: lwm2m_os_pdn_event_handler_t

briefdescription.para: PDN event handler.

detaileddescription.para: If assigned during PDP context creation, the event handler will receive status information relative to the Packet Data Network connection, as reported by the AT notifications CNEC and GGEV.
This handler is executed by the same context that dispatches AT notifications.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the PDN functionality.

simplesect.para: int Zero on success or an errno otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Create a Packet Data Protocol (PDP) context.

detaileddescription.para: If a callback is provided via the cb parameter, generate events from the CNEC and GGEV AT notifications to report state of the Packet Data Network (PDN) connection.

parameterdescription.para: The ID of the new PDP context.

simplesect.para: int Zero on success or an errno otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t cid, const char *apn, enum lwm2m_os_pdn_fam family)
memberdef.name: lwm2m_os_pdn_ctx_configure

briefdescription.para: Configure a Packet Data Protocol context.

parameterdescription.para: The Access Point Name to configure the PDP context with.
The family to configure the PDN context for.

simplesect.para: int Zero on success or an errno otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Destroy a Packet Data Protocol context.

simplesect.para: int Zero on success or an errno otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Activate a Packet Data Network (PDN) connection.

parameterdescription.para: The PDP context ID to activate a connection for.
If provided, the function will block to return the ESM error reason.

simplesect.para: int Zero on success or an errno otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Deactivate a Packet Data Network (PDN) connection.

simplesect.para: int Zero on success or an errno otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the PDN ID for a given PDP Context.

detaileddescription.para: The PDN ID can be used to route traffic through a Packet Data Network.

parameterdescription.para: The context ID of the PDN connection.

simplesect.para: int Zero on success or an errno otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Retrieve the default Access Point Name (APN).

detaileddescription.para: The default APN is the APN of the default PDP context (zero).

parameterdescription.para: The buffer to copy the APN into.
The size of the output buffer.

simplesect.para: int Zero on success or an errno otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Set a callback for events pertaining to the default PDP context (zero).

briefdescription.para: Initialize a semaphore.

parameterdescription.para: Timeout in ms or -1 for forever.

Start a workqueue.

briefdescription.para: Release a timer task.
Start a timer on system work queue.

parameterdescription.para: Delay before submitting the task in ms.
If timeout is NO_WAIT and work was already on a queue
If timeout is NO_WAIT and work was not submitted but has now been queued to workqueue; or timeout is not NO_WAIT and work has been scheduled
If delay is NO_WAIT and work was running and has been queued to the queue that was running it

briefdescription.para: Start a timer on a specific queue.

parameterdescription.para: Delay before submitting the task in ms.
If timeout is NO_WAIT and work was already on a queue
If timeout is NO_WAIT and work was not submitted but has now been queued to work_q; or timeout is not NO_WAIT and work has been scheduled
If delay is NO_WAIT and work was running and has been queued to the queue that was running it

briefdescription.para: Cancel a timer run.
Obtain the time remaining on a timer.

parameterdescription.para: Whether the credential exists. Only valid if the operation is successful.

If the certificate chain do not match.

briefdescription.para: Provision a certificate chain or update an existing one.

parameterdescription.para: The operation failed because the LTE link is active.
Not enough memory to store the credential.
The security tag could not be written.

briefdescription.para: Check if a pre-shared key exists in persistent storage.

The permission flags of the credential. Only valid if the operation is successful and exists is true. Not yet implemented.

briefdescription.para: Provision a new pre-shared key or update an existing one.

simplesect.para: If used when the LTE link is active, the function will return an error and the key will not be written.

The operation failed because the LTE link is active.
The security tag could not be written.

parameterdescription.para: The operation failed because the LTE link is active.
No credential associated with the given sec_tag and cred_type.

briefdescription.para: Maximum number of work queues that the system must support.
Maximum number of timers that the system must support.
Maximum number of semaphores that the system must support.
Range of the non-volatile storage identifiers used by the library.

simplesect.para: The application MUST NOT use the values within this range for its own non-volatile storage management as it could potentially delete or overwrite entries used by the library.
